New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 11 月 8 日星期五 04:14:30 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Gisborne roads to convert from sealed to unsealed amid budget cuts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-roads-to-convert-from-sealed-to-unsealed-amid-budget-cuts/DLVKWVQN75HVNNZX3J3HB4TQ2Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-roads-to-convert-from-sealed-to-unsealed-amid-budget-cuts/DLVKWVQN75HVNNZX3J3HB4TQ2Y/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterPolicy needed as Gisborne council plans unsealed roads; public meetings to discuss impact. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Mata Rd, pictured in 2020, could have sections of its lower end reverted to an unsealed condition according to Gisborne District Council plans. It is on a list of 86 sealed roads within Gisborne city and along the East Coast a report says have deteriorated to such an extent that it would be more beneficial to either revert the road or parts of it to an unsealed state or to resurface it with a cost-effective chip seal coating. Photo / Gisborne District Council Facebook page

The level 2 NCEA maths question that knocked the confidence of our top students https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-level-2-ncea-maths-question-that-knocked-the-confidence-of-our-top-students/QDISMTPN4BDD3OUELHUZ25EFOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-level-2-ncea-maths-question-that-knocked-the-confidence-of-our-top-students/QDISMTPN4BDD3OUELHUZ25EFOI/ Kirsty WynnThe question on the volume of a drink container was above the level of the standard tested Fri, 08 Nov 2024 03:25:15 +0000 The question was well above the skill level for even excellence students in level 2 maths according to head teachers.

Greens’ Copyright (Parody and Satire) bill to be debated in Parliamenthttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/greens-copyright-parody-and-satire-bill-to-be-debated-in-parliament/XJ5CCTZHDFA27GY3HUEOAUKLPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/greens-copyright-parody-and-satire-bill-to-be-debated-in-parliament/XJ5CCTZHDFA27GY3HUEOAUKLPI/ It will allow people to use a copyright work for parody or satire, such as memes. Northland kids to benefit from Kiwi Christmas Books charity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-kids-to-benefit-from-kiwi-christmas-books-charity/RDJR44DPAJE23IDCHO2PS2MCLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-kids-to-benefit-from-kiwi-christmas-books-charity/RDJR44DPAJE23IDCHO2PS2MCLE/ Mike DinsdaleThe charity has three Northland stores collecting books this festive season. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 03:08:40 +0000 Tobias Alexander with some of the new books donated to Pahia Bookshop last year for Kiwi Christmas Books. The charity is collecting books at three Northland bookstores this year.
